heroDescription: Aliso Viejo, a vibrant city in Orange County, offers a blend of suburban charm and urban amenities.
landscapeDescription: With a population of 50,175, Aliso Viejo thrives in a diverse economy supported by technology and healthcare sectors. The city benefits from its proximity to major urban centers.
uniqueNeeds: Aliso Viejo requires tailored financial strategies for its tech-heavy workforce and growing real estate market.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Aliso Viejo's economy is expanding, driven by tech and healthcare sectors, with a growth rate of 3.5%.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Aliso Viejo is $92,000, reflecting a relatively affluent community.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Aliso Viejo increasingly specialize in tech and real estate investments.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Aliso Viejo's cost of living is 15% above the national average, driven by housing and transportation costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the median home price in Aliso Viejo is approximately $800,000, with a 10% increase year-over-year.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Aliso Viejo's business climate is favorable, with a supportive local government and access to venture capital.
